Will They Fit?

About the Split Rim Offset Calculator

The split rim offset calculator allows you to calculate the new width and offsetof your 3-piece (split rim) wheels when your change the inner barrel and/or outer lip
Here are some examples that will automatically complete the calculator from to help you get started:
  • Adding a larger outer lip to an 8J et32 wheel.
  • Changing both inner and outer sections of a 10J et45 wheel.
* Note that you do not have to fill in all the fields for the calculator to give you a result.
